reviewText: Great! Great! so much fun to watch .Perfect team work .as son and father. Great acting.from both. I love how Scalia calls Rock big guy. They are a perfect match. Love the movie so nice and clean and decent .we need so much more of these kind of films.
Between McMillan And Wife and Dynasty Rock Hudson starred in this action packed father son television series. Jack Scalia played his son.

Who says you can't go back in time? When I first moved to California in 1979, I was pursuing acting. I ended up doing about a dozen appearances on "The Devlin Connection" with Rock Hudson and Jack Scalia. Never had a single line! I was, what in those days they called an extra, now days they call them atmosphere! It's been fun trying to track down the episodes just for old times sake. The material arrived on time and as promised, in great condition! Wow, I looked much younger and thinner 25 years ago!!!
